com.revature.GSQL.ObjectMapper

Class ObjectMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.GSQL.ObjectMapper.ObjectMapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ObjectGetter, ObjectRemover, ObjectSaver, ObjectUpdater

    public abstract class ObjectMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Class which serves as the parent class to all clases which directly interact with the database.

      • getSerialName

        protected java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getSerialName(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        If the class has a serial key then we need to get the name of that annotation name;
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to check for serial key annotation.
        Returns:
        Optional which will hold the name of the serial key if it exists.

      • getSerialKeyEntry

        protected java.util.Optional<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.reflect.Method,java.lang.String[]>> getSerialKeyEntry(java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> name,
                                                                                                                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.reflect.Method,java.lang.String[]> setters)
        If the object has a serial key then get the map entry associated with its setter.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the serial key
        setters - the hashmap associated with the setters of the object.
        Returns:
        Optional which will hold the Map Entry if it exists.

      • setPreparedStatementByType

        protected void setPreparedStatementByType(java.sql.PreparedStatement pstmt,
                                          java.lang.String type,
                                          java.lang.String input,
                                          int index)
        Sets the value inside of a prepared statment based upon the parameter type.
        Parameters:
        pstmt - prepared statement to set.
        type - parameter type
        input - the value to place inside of the prepared statement
        index - index to place the value at.

      • parseColumns

        protected java.lang.String parseColumns(java.lang.String[] columns,
                                        java.lang.String[] operators)
        Parse through the columns and operators array. converts them into a string to turn into a preparedstatment.
        Parameters:
        columns - list of columns in database to check for.
        operators - list of operators to apply to the columns.
        Returns:
        string containing the columns and operators of the form "column1 = ? 'operator' column2 = ?"

      • addListToCache

        Add list of objects to the cache.
        Parameters:
        obj_list - Optional containing list of objects to add to the cache.
